name: Office24
description:
Our call-answering agents work as if they were at your office: providing a live answering service by taking messages, booking appointments, handling calls on your behalf and forwarding information when required. Our virtual phone answering service operates with a market leading, sophisticated call answering system ensuring our virtual assistants are kept abreast of your day-to-day call handling requirements. We offer so much more than a call answering service.
We strive to take professional care of your clients on your behalf, and can provide you with a call answering service in English, German, French and Italian.
